data.chText: 不能改变的；无法矫正的
她是个不可救药的乐天派。

tr: a person whose disease is incurable

value.def: If someone has an incurable disease, they cannot be cured of it.

example.ex: He is suffering from an incurable skin disease.
example.tran: 他患有无法根治的皮肤病。

value.tran: (疾病)无法治愈的，不可医治的

example.ex: ...youngsters who are disabled, or incurably ill.

value.def: You can use incurable to indicate that someone has a particular quality or attitude and will not change.

example.ex: Poor old William is an incurable romantic...
example.tran: 可怜的老威廉是个无可救药的浪漫主义者。

example.ex: You are either very young or an incurable optimist.
example.tran: 你要么非常年轻,要么是个不可救药的乐天派。

value.tran: 无法改变的;无可救药的

example.ex: I know you think I'm incurably nosey.
example.tran: 我知道你认为我老爱管闲事,不可救药。
